Reviews.Title: Nice Box, Junk Inside
Reviews.Author: Joseph G.
Reviews.Content: 1. Needs full batery chage before every use.2. Working motion capture window is 2-3 hours then it powers down.3. Directions are bad but understandable with careful reading.4. Picture quality is okay, as expected for a product in this price range.5. Sometimes it works; sometimes not...probably not again after a few uses.

Reviews.Title: does not work properly
Reviews.Author: William Kang
Reviews.Content: This product does not work properly. The voice does not match the video and is delayed by 2 seconds.  .

Reviews.Title: Save Your Money
Reviews.Author: augie
Reviews.Content: The instructions are difficult to understand and when I did get it to work it was more by trail, and error.Motion sensing is sketchy..sometimes it works, often it doesn't.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: Instructions were not clear,  only holds a charge for about 12hrs and takes 24 to fully charge back up.  Only stores 3 5min videos befor going into standby in which it no longer records.  I only give it a 1 beacuse the picture is nice and the audio clear.  Otherwise it was not worth it,  more hassle than bennifit

Reviews.Title: Save your Money
Reviews.Author: M Morris
Reviews.Content: Sometimes it works mostly it doesn't. The instructions are not translated properly and are hard to understand. Skip this purchase.

Reviews.Title: spy cam
Reviews.Author: tammy s. frye
Reviews.Content: very awesome piece of equipment.  also does the job!  will order again if need be. thanks so much for the help.

Reviews.Title: Nice product. You'll be happy.
Reviews.Author: ~D~
Reviews.Content: Excellent for tracking people walking in and out of a room or garage. Good to keep an eye on what's important for you.

Reviews.Title: Does not match the description. No memory card included.
Reviews.Author: Zheng
Reviews.Content: First of all, unlike it is shown in the Product Description, there is no "1 x 4GB TF card" included.Next, it looks like somebody already "pre-owned" this camera. The bottom compartment, that hold the USB cable, User Manual and, presumably, the memory car was closed with a carbon that has a hole in the middle. That hole is closed with a "seal" in new package. It was broken. The USB cable was packed into some plastic back in a harry. The camera itself shall be secured in some spongy support and then placed into plastic bag. It was done in reverse. As result, the camera "jumped" out of the box once I lifted the lid. It looks like somebody forgot the order of packing this item.Finally, I tried to read the User Manual. One moment in the manual looks very "promising":"Notice:d. When you make a video, please focus on the object and keep 50cm under sufficient illumination."Well, there in no focus in this camera.And, 50cm???And look at that "posrter"!1280x960 AVI? -- No, it is 720 x 480.HD quality? -- Do "they" even know what HD stands for?Motion detection? -- Probably, if you were lucky to get this camera properly assembled.8GB? -- Well, the user manual and the box say "up to 16BG", while the Product Description tells only about 4GB, despite the fact "they" cannot deliver even described.I am returning this item right away.

Reviews.Title: poor product
Reviews.Author: kcpilotpat
Reviews.Content: I wish i would have read the reviews before purchasing. They don't work very well.  Has a motion sensor to start, but only captures one event then shuts off?  Has audio and nothing in the literature discloses that. Probably ok in manual mode if you want to use that way.

Reviews.Title: Waste of your money
Reviews.Author: Lockmaster69
Reviews.Content: I just opened the package and the first thing I found was an instruction book that was hard to understand and read.  After taking the unit apart to figure out how to make it work, I found out it won,t work without the TS card that I did not order.  But now that I know how bad the unit is and dought if it will work I,m not going to waste anymore money to by a memory card to try the unit.  I wasted my money and hope you don't.  But to be fair I don't know if it works.

Reviews.Title: Complete RUBISH DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Phillip Brey
Reviews.Content: Firstly the picture in the description it detailed it came with a power supply and Micro SD card this is not the case.Also There was no plastic back so i need to stick it on the wall with new tape every time i take it off and on.

Reviews.Title: Door Hooks
Reviews.Author: Monsi L'Ggrke
Reviews.Content: These clothes hooks are terrific imposter hooks and are easy to mistake for a cloth hook and an intruder will never know.

Reviews.Title: Check the resolution . . .
Reviews.Author: HuskerTechGuy
Reviews.Content: The camera that I received from USAsouthernSTAR had a resolution of 720x480, not 1280x960.  The lower resolution results in a field of view that is so narrow that it makes the camera nearly useless.  The camera that this one was intended to replace had a resolution of 1280x960 and worked great until the battery died.  Unfortunately, it appears that the manufacturer in China producing these cameras is now making them all with the lower resolution.  Be sure to check with the merchant to see which version they are selling.

Reviews.Title: spy coat hook hidden camera
Reviews.Author: Dorinda Lord-Blake
Reviews.Content: the instructions that came eiht the product are too small to read, also the motion control option does not work.  the light is suppose to blink 3 times after two long holds on the button. it does not blink

Reviews.Title: hello
Reviews.Author: luis alberto cardenas
Reviews.Content: its not working this camera i try to make work but its not working how can change or sand back
